### Speakers  
UCSF Community and Government Relations

UCSF government relations provided information, tools, and skills to better equip scientists to advocate for basic research, higher education, science funding, and scientific rigor in policy and decision-making. Co-hosted with the Graduate Division as part of the Advocating for Science and Scientists series.
